title: Who are these people in the new Ezreal skin splash...
body:
take a look.

the woman is probably a redhead, or has brown hair.
the man looks big and tall.

thoughts?

replies.body: Kat and Jayce
nah man its jayce and pentakill sona
Those were my first thoughts.
where's morgana's wings? o.0

They got 'clipped' out ;D
Now I'm thinking it could be {{champion:134}} {{champion:67}}

Syndra was my first thought for the woman on the left.  No ideas on t he other girl, but Diana could be cool.

I'm definitely thinking Katarina and Jayce for the two in the background.
{{champion:55}} and {{champion:86}} was my thought.
It would make sense that it's the two other champions who also have a "Debonair" skin, Jayce and Vi.
It can't be {{champion:254}}, she is playing against him
Considering the hair on the female, I'm guessing {{champion:51}} Caitlyn, the male is likely {{champion:126}}  Jayce
{{champion:78}}   and {{champion:36}} for sure. Debonair Mundo confirmed.
I think the women might be pentakill Sona if it isn't MF that is.
Ya I think it looks more like sona than katarina.
Another skin for Ezreal -_-

i'm thinking its 
{{champion:55}} {{champion:126}}

I think its {{champion:61}}  and {{champion:126}} in the far off background 

and right behind ez is probably {{champion:25}} {{champion:21}}

I know the lighting probably obscures the color so its darker, but given the obvious Piltover setting and the style of the hair (where one side is longer than the other), I'm pretty sure the female is Caitlyn.
We need more refunds not more crappy skins
But "Ellen Degenres" Ezreal is a great skin!
Debonair Garen. And some faceless woman.
the man looks like jayce,the women looks like katarina,but the question is...who is the women standing beside him.
Niel patrick harris, and colbie smulders.
It looks like {{champion:55}} and {{champion:126}}
{{champion:25}} and {{champion:126}} I think.

I think, like most of the people who responded, that the man is Debonair Jayce. Not sure about the woman in the background (my guess is Secret Agent MF), but the woman bringing drinks kinda reminds me of LeBlanc.

Looks like an upscale place,and they seem to be having a nice drink... possibly romantic?
My guess is Debonair Jayce and Heartseeker Ashe.
looks like {{champion:55}} {{champion:122}} /{{champion:126}}

the two in the way back i think might just be vi and jayce idk and the two in the front i think are LEFT - {{champion:69}}  
RIGHT - {{champion:21}}   lol
I would say jayce and katarina/morgana/janna? (Janna is technically Piltover by City-State hopping) though Janna doesnt seem to have any style of hair like that.
Jayce and no idea on the woman
